translated: In the fifteenth century, the European economy is recovering from the severe agricultural and demographic crisis of the fourteenth century, due to the ravages of the Hundred Years War and the Black Death.
original: Au XVe siècle, l'économie européenne se remet de la grave crise agricole et démographique du XIVe siècle, due aux ravages de la Guerre de Cent Ans et à la Peste noire.
